name: Space Shooter (itch) (Leigh Norton)
description:
Space Shooter: The Game 

A simple bullet hell style game with 2 difficulty modes. 

- Easy mode gives you 6 hits and double lasers for more damage. Enemies will also give you double the points, move slower and there won't be as many. 

- Normal mode only gives you 3 hits and one laser. Enemies move faster and are more numerous. There is also a new enemy type the further you get. 

Controls: 

Menus - Mouse 

Movement - WASD Shoot - Spacebar
